= Contact =

If you should have any questions regarding the car2go Open API, try the following steps:

  * Read our wiki pages on car2go.googlecode.com
  * Browse the API documentation we compiled for you
  * See the group discussion for assistance. There might have been others with the same problem or an idea how to solve it.
  * If that doesn't help, contact us at openapi@car2go.com
